definition: to destroy/to spoil/to ruin/to injure/cruel/oppressive/savage/brutal/incomplete/disabled/to remain/to survive/remnant/surplus
broken/damaged/worn out/lousy/rotten/to break, split or cleave/to get rid of/to destroy/to break with/to defeat/to capture (a city etc)/to expose the truth of

sentences.english: But What shall people to do about the broken marriage, the demoralization ?
sentences.chinese: 但是什么将要做的人们关于残破的婚姻，败坏人心？

sentences.english: Children picked through the debris to uncover school bags and torn books.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们在废墟中找寻上学的书包和残破的书本。

sentences.english: Kaput wooden salt carriers have also been preserved in the depot.
sentences.chinese: 残破的运盐用木质敞车群亦在保存之列。

sentences.english: Some utensils were in a state of decay when they were unearthed.
sentences.chinese: 有些器皿在出土时已经残破。

sentences.english: Lie crushed and broken on the virgin snow.
sentences.chinese: 残破地躺在洁白无瑕的白雪上。

sentences.english: A little stream of knowledge tricked slowly through a deep worn gully.
sentences.chinese: 知识的小溪流沿着幽深而残破的山谷缓缓地流着。

sentences.english: But the games are here and some of the older, shabby neighborhoods remain.
sentences.chinese: 奥林匹克竞赛已经到来，但周边的残破老旧也依旧在。

sentences.english: But a small number of women of child commonly broken milk excretion, even to several consecutive years.
sentences.chinese: 但少数妇子常见残破性乳汁排泄，偶可连续数年。

sentences.english: He spends most of his time in a rudimentary office trying to avoid assassination.
sentences.chinese: 他大多数时间躲在残破的办公室里躲避暗杀。

sentences.english: I soon rebuilt the palace that had been partly broken.
sentences.chinese: 我之后又重建了残破的宫殿。

sentences.english: Your broken body belongs to Hakkar.
sentences.chinese: 你残破的躯体属于哈卡。

sentences.english: At left, a Broken wild on the Great Wall, already switch direction.
sentences.chinese: 左先生到达一段残破的野长城上时，已经辨不清方向。

sentences.english: New paintings up to the literati painting but just incomplete.
sentences.chinese: 至少新文人画不外是残破的文人画罢了。

sentences.english: Broken beautiful haroun pants Broken flower?
sentences.chinese: 残破的美丽哈龙裤子破花？

sentences.english: Archaic temples, mottled wreck of the gods.
sentences.chinese: 陈旧古老的寺庙，斑驳残破的神像。

sentences.english: After Boxer Russian chaos, Heilongjiang area was more Dilapidated.
sentences.chinese: 庚子之乱后，黑龙江地区更加残破不堪。
